definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Objective To appraise the clinic effect of mini-invasive drainage on hemorrhages cerebral apoplexy with herniation.
sentences.chinese: 探讨微创穿刺引流对出血性脑卒中并脑疝的治疗价值。

sentences.english: Bowel or omentum may herniate alongside the drain .
sentences.chinese: 肠管或网膜可能沿引流物疝出。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the causes of herniation of brain due to errors of doc tors and nurses.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析脑外科患者脑疝形成过程中的救护失误原因。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of ultrasound in incisional hernia before and after its operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声对切口疝修补手术前后检查的应用价值。

sentences.english: Bowel may herniate alongside a drain, with resulting obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 肠管可能沿著引流物疝出，导致梗阻。

sentences.english: The ruptured disc may herniate and push against a nerve, causing pain in the low back, leg, or both.
sentences.chinese: 椎间盘破裂会疝出并挤压神经，引起腰腿痛。

sentences.english: Objective To summary the experience of diagnosis and treatment of incarcerated inguinal hernia in newborns .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结新生儿嵌顿性腹股沟斜疝的诊治经验。

sentences.english: Results Brain edema and brain herniation caused by epidural hematoma lead to the death.
sentences.chinese: 结果死者系硬膜外血肿致脑水肿并脑疝而死亡。

sentences.english: Hiatal hernia associated with reflux esophagitis.
sentences.chinese: 裂孔疝与返流性食管炎。

sentences.english: The hernia defects were repaired through laparotomy and laparoscopy respectively.
sentences.chinese: 膈疝可分别应用剖腹手术或腹腔镜进行修补。

sentences.english: Frequently this is due to fluid collecting within the previous space of the hernia.
sentences.chinese: 大多数是由于原来疝所在的地方聚集了液体所致。

sentences.english: Conclusion Frontotemporal anterior herniation was the most common type of TNH after cerebral injury.
sentences.chinese: 结论头部受力后易在额颞部发生前位疝。

sentences.english: Conclusions Acupotomy should be used to treat the chronic pain after groin hernia repair.
sentences.chinese: 结论可以考虑应用针刀治疗疝修补术后切口疼痛。

sentences.english: Occasionally, patients develop a lump or some swelling in the area where their hernia had been.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔，手术后病人会在疝的位置发生隆起或肿块。

sentences.english: Ultrasound investigation revealed diaphragmatic hernia with intrathoracic cystic mass.
sentences.chinese: 此次超声检查发现膈疝和胸腔内的囊性团块。

sentences.english: When a ventral hernia occurs, it usually arises in the abdominal wall where a previous surgical incision was made.
sentences.chinese: 腹疝一般发生在曾经做过手术的腹壁切口周围。

definition: sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
